summary: A Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) and Contact Center Entrepreneur with 27 years of domestic, international, and Fortune 1000 sales and operations experience.Experienced in all facets of outsourcing, including idea-generation that creates a competitive advantage, growing revenues, and  implementing technology and operational processes which drive revenue, EBITDA, customer satisfaction (NPS/C-SAT) and low employee turnover.Industry expertise in Information Technology Outsourcing (Technical Support), Managed Service Providers (MSP's), Customer Service, Lead Generation, Artificial Intelligence (AI) and leveraging Robotics to supplement human interactions when (or if) necessary.I take a very unique approach to global outsourcing.  At the end of the day, outsourcing is all about the labor you are tapping into (hiring) to deliver a service, solve a problem, sell a product, or improve a service.  Outsourcing is NOT about the technology, industry verticals.  It all about the people.  Therefore, I approach outsourcing from a labor/people approach first, ensuring we have very low employee attrition (currently 15% a year) that exceeds customer expectations from markets that are not saturated with other contact centers.Deep background in Travel, Telecom (Wireless, Cable, Satellite, Broadband, IT, Consumer Services, Healthcare, Medical, Insurance and Energy (including utilities).
name: Steve Shefveland
title: Founder and Managing Director at Emerging Global Services, LLC (EGS)
